message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product that I think you'll love. I'm looking to sell it to you for $250. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer!  $250 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  Would you be willing to do $100?  That's the absolute maximum I'm able to spend on this.
I understand that $100 is a bit lower than my initial price, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can do $175 for the product. Is that something you'd be comfortable with?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $175 is still a bit too high for me. How about $125?  I'm really hoping we can find a way to make this work.
I'm willing to meet you at $150, which is the minimum I'm willing to sell it for. I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?

Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $150 is still a bit out of my budget.  I'm going to have to stick with my offer of $125.  If you're not able to accept that, I'm going to have to go with John's offer.
